descriptionHtml:
Adds an Expert level Conjuration spell that summons a Female Dremora Valkynaz.
Available in the Shrine of Mehrunes Dagon or via console.

It is stand-alone and does not overwrite default dremora in any way.

This summon is FULLY VOICED. 
It has all the default Dremora Lords lines all shifted up to sound female.
It is based off the Dremora Lord, everything that applies to it, will to this. Same magicka cost, etc.

One difference: this one will scale to your level, so if you\'re low level it\'s more balanced, if you\'re high level it\'s more balanced.

I made this for myself, as I enjoy giving followers the Sanguine Rose, and this gave me some variety. Putting it up here for anyone interested in doing similar. Summon your own Dremora couple to massacre your foes. 

Changing and adding the voice was a lot of work, so hopefully you guys dig it. It\'s really cool when you have the male and female rampaging together :)

REQUIREMENTS:

Skyrim

INSTALL:

Extract the .rar and drop everything in your data directory.
I have no idea if this is NMM compatible, I don\'t use it. Sorry.
author: gr00grams
